page.title: 05UNEMPLOYMENT (LOCAL) Cont.
page.content: The previously unemployed aeronautical engineer who runs his own waste disposal company called Bolton Mini Skips has been in business for twelve months.He collects scrap metal and sorts it out into various categories: chrome, aluminium, copper,iron and steel.For every ton of metal he receives Â£35 and he can expect as much as Â£55 for a scrap car engine. The iron and steel is crushed by machinery and is eventually sold to Spain where it is smelted down and used in the manufacture of cars. Paper and wood are burnt and rocks, stones and bricks (called hard core) are sold to builders. The business is slowly growing and the owner has now been able to employ a young man.However, competition is keen and unemployment is always a possibility.
